alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 14 at 8:28PM CDT until March 17 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bovina. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying agricultural land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 27.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to 29.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Black River Bovina 28.0 27.5 Mon 7 pm CDT 28.4 28.8 27.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1130 AM CDT.
